EmailTemplate.description: Reply to confirm OneNav+ License request
EmailTemplate.name: All Services - Reply to confirm OneNav+ License request
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Case_Number__c} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Thank you for your OneNav+ license request.
A license key has been generated. You should receive an email from dsa@honeywell.com with instructions to activate the license.
Please contact us if we can be of any further assistance.
Best regards,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName}
Database Services Accounts Phone: 602-436-6737, Option 1 dsa@honeywell.com
For 24-Hour/7-Day mechanical or avionics technical support, please contact ATS (Aerospace Technical Support) at 855-808-6500 for within the United States and 602-365-6500 for outside the United States,Fax 1-602-365-3343, or email AeroTechSupport@honeywell.com
